Text:
Greatest dance group ever. What a shame they had to disband... Rhythm and Stealth made me go into a 'headspin'... what an album! 

Already have this, but FLAC is the way to go for Leftfield...

Mega thanks for the share...

Jonny Laaaa you're a hero!

Thanks for a FLAC up of one of the most powerful electro albums of the 90's..

Been out and bought it after hearing it again!
